item.title: Global Restore Project
item.description: Global Restore Project (GRP) A database of ecological restoration projects around the world. Status: ongoing Summary The Global Restore Project is a database of ecological restoration projects around the world. Our vision for this project is long-term. We are focused on collecting species-level community vegetation monitoring data right now. In other words, we are interested in studies where folks monitored all the species that occured in their monitoring samples.
